name: Vonage Video API / Azure AD B2C Sample App
description: This sample app shows how to use the Vonage Video API while authenticating users with Azure AD B2C.

apiKey.description: Vonage Video API Project API Key

apiSecret.description: Vonage Video API Project API Secret

azureB2CRedirectUrl.description: Url to redirect auth requests to

azureB3CKnownAuthorities.description: Azure AD B2C known authorities (i.e. yourco.b2clogin.com)
